name: A bilious amber band
data: It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It increases the users hitpoints adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
The ring promotes health and restoration.
